          Defines the possible actions that result when a label is dropped on this component.

          This class handles a set of embedded CanonicizerLabel instances.

          Used to indicate what set of documents are affected by packets generated by this packager.
CanonicizerLabelUnpackager
          This interface defines a single method inpackageLabel(CanonicizerPacket).
CanonicizerPacket
          This class essentially encapsulates a single CanonicizerLabel and any relevant transfer information as it is moved from one location in the GUI to another.
DnDManager
          This class is the single point of contact between the guiDriver (GUI backend) and all of the drag and drop functionality on the CanonicizeStepPanel.
IconGlassPane
          GlassPane class, responsible for rendering an icon under the mouse during a drag and drop.
